titles.title: Recognizing the importance of families and children in the United States and expressing support for the goals and ideas of National Family Day.

referral.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

referral.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

bill.summary: Supports the goals and ideas of National Family Day (a Sunday in March) as established by KidsPeace.
